companies.Company: Al Nahrain Specialty Medical Center LLC
companies.BDescription: a full-service medical center providing incomparable medical solutions to the city's residents.
companies.full_description:
Al Nahrain Specialty  Medical Center is a full-service medical center providing incomparable medical solutions to the city’s residents. Established to cater to the needs of Ajman’s multicultural community. The team’s mission is to ensure that clients receive the highest quality and most advanced Medical consultation and procedures and superior customer service, each time they visit.  
      The clinic was established in 2016. Some of the silent features of our medical center are as follows:
      
      -We are the only medical center in Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Road, Ajman
      -We have the huge trust of our 9000+ patient base and treated close to 30+ nationalities
      -Affordable and nominal treatment costs to serve the community efficiently.
      -The center is designed according to the recent Architectural and Technical requirements (2018) of the Ministry of Health and we were appreciated for the perfect design and modern amenities.
      -Ample parking space is available near the medical cente.
      -Highly efficient team of Dermatology, Gynecology, General Surgeon, Nurses, Administrative Supervisor, Receptionist and designated Insurance Coordinator.
      -We are already having a direct billing contract with around 15 insurance companies.
      -Top class facilities including software, e billing, e prescriptions, digital X-rays, and high end sterilization protocols.
      
      
       
       
      Hours: 
      Thursday        9 AM–9 PM
      Friday        9 AM–9 PM
      Saturday        9 AM–9 PM
      Sunday        9 AM–9 PM
      Monday        9 AM–9 PM
      Tuesday        9 AM–9 PM
      Wednesday        9 AM–9 PM
